page.title: 11Building Changes.
page.content: In our area many buildings have changed their usage because they are no longer needed for their original purpose. As hops are no longer grown here oast houses have been converted into attractive homes.Barns have also been converted as bigger,modern barns are being built. Life in Shipbourne has changed,since the coming of the motor car people have been able to travel out of the village.This means that they shop else where and don't use the local shops.So the butcher shop the Post Office and village shop are now comfortable homes. Stumle Hill was once the vicarage but now a modern smaller one has been built. Rebecca
